section.title:
work order material requirements returning in batch mode
batch mode return w/o materials using
work orders return material batch from Return W/O Material Batch
section.para: To return Work Order materials to Inventory simultaneously in a batch, select the "Return W/O Material Batch" option. The following screen will appear:
When returning Work Order materials to Inventory simultaneously in a batch, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Work Order Number of the Work Order whose materials you want to return to Inventory simultaneously in a batch.
Displays Site code automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Displays Item Number automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Displays Work Order Status automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without returning Work Order materials to Inventory, bringing you back to the application desktop.
Returns the Work Order's materials to Inventory simultaneously in a batch.
